        int[] inputColorRow(int pegs,
                    int colors)
             throws FinishGameException,
                    CommandInterruptException
        Input a combination of colors
        Parameters:
        pegs - is the number of pegs in the combination
        colors - is the number of different possible colors in a combination
        Returns:
        the combination
        Throws:
        FinishGameException - the finish game exception
        CommandInterruptException - the command interrupt exception
